data.text: First of all, we loved this hotel. The staff was great and the rooms were lovely.  However....we were robbed in the lobby restaurant during the day at a corner table.   We had checked in the day before and had dinner at the SAME table.  Our kids had flown in the second morning and had rested in our room since their rooms were not available.  In the early afternoon the adults came down and we were playing cards.  A female employee brought us chips without us asking.  Later she brought olives. Again without a request for them.  I recognized her as the hostess from the upstairs restaurant where we had lunch that day.   A man wearing a Michigan shirt came and sat directly next to my daughter.  There wasn't another person in the restaurant.  I said "GO BLUE".  He just looked at me.  I repeated myself and my son in law said in Spanish, "your t-shirt" and pointed to his shirt.  Coincidence that he walked in off the street?  Perhaps... I looked up to see him walking away rapidly and my son in law realized that his phone and wallet that he had sat on the shelf behind my daughter were gone.  In Spain you must report your crime and then the police look at the security video.  We went to report and the police said we don't speak English...they couldn't have cared less. The hotel wouldn't allow us to view the security tapes.  A very unhappy start to our vacation.
data.title: BEWARE!!!!     We were robbed in the lobby restaurant.

data.text: My son booked this stay for us to celebrate my wife's 50th birthday, and we checked in yesterday under his name. My son specifically requested a birthday card or some sort of acknowledgment for my wife since it's her milestone birthday, but unfortunately, that request was completely ignored. Needless to say, it's left us quite disappointed to start. We're set to check out on Tuesday, April 9th, and we'll certainly be providing a more thorough review then.
data.title: Request completely ignored

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your feedback.

We're thrilled you're enjoying the pristine conditions of our rooms and the prime spot we've nestled into right in the heart of Barcelona's vibrant scene. It's an absolute bummer that the birthday card for your mom's special day slipped through the cracks - we aim to make every celebration unforgettable, and it´s a shame that it didn´t reach her room, as the do not disturb sign was on and therefore we couldn´t enter her room and leave the note and cava we had for her to celebrate. On a brighter note, our team is always eager to share the local gems and festivities that make Barcelona buzz with energy. We're delighted you're soaking up the culture and hope you'll continue to discover all the delightful surprises our city has in store. Stay Curious!

We hope to welcome you back.
Best wishes,

Belén Sánchez, Guest Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
Excellent hotel, modern, great location within walking distance to La Rambla and the coast. The service is outstanding. Would like to thank Jorge at the front desk and Gabriel at the luggage station for going above and beyond to make our stay comfortable! Other amazing feature is free mini bar with local beverages, yoga mat, plenty of power sockets, incl USB and wireless. Breakfast buffet also very good, variety of foods  incl. gluten free and vegan. Welcoming and helpful staff at the buffet. Last but not least, the housekeeping keep the rooms very clean and are very helpful! Also, right in front of the hotel is the metro station which you can use to go around in Barcelona. Highly recommend this hotel! 
Mariya, Angel and Nia
data.title: Great location and outstanding service!

data.text: Excellent hotel. Very comfortable room. Fabulous shower with toiletries. Amazing breakfast… so much choice. Received with a warm welcome and lots of advice about the location. I would definitely recommend this hotel. I asked for a quiet room .
data.title: Excellent hotel!

data.text:
This is a must place to stay if visiting Barcelona. 
The location is fantastic and the staff cannot do enough to help you and go above and beyond. 
Will definitely be recommending this hotel to friends and family . 
It’s a 20 minute walk to Los Ramblas and a mile and a half to the beach . 
It’s approximately 30 euros in a taxi from the airport .
data.title: Perfect hotel in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hey Mandy! 
Your kind words are music to our ears. Thanks for the rave review.

We're absolutely thrilled that you found our location fantastic and that our staff made such a memorable impression during your stay. It's wonderful to hear that you'd recommend us to friends and family—nothing beats word of mouth! We take pride in being nestled in the heart of Barcelona's cultural epicenter, a stone's throw from the vibrant Las Ramblas and the refreshing sea breeze of the beaches. It's music to our ears that you've experienced the artful embrace of our city, and that our hotel served as your urban retreat.
While we're all about smooth landings and takeoffs, we're glad to hear that the taxi fare from the airport didn't take the shine off your journey. Remember, our team is always on hand to share the secret local spots so you can dive deeper into the Barcelona vibe next time you visit.

See you again soon.
Take care,

Belén Sánchez, Guest Relations Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager
